website_summaries.verdict: Certified and charges BLACK+DECKER cordless power tools with 18 volts of power.
pros: Performs longer than some OEM options and works with most cordless power tools including tree trimmers that require lots of power and a lengthy charge
Usage is bolstered by the second battery
cons: May not fit with 100% of all BLACK+DECKER cordless tools

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT replace HPB18-OPE 18v
customer_reviews.text: The description for this battery states it replaces the HPB18-OPE 18v battery. It does not. I have 3 B&D tools that run on that battery and these did not fit any of those tools. This battery has three prongs; my HPB18-OPE 18v batteries have only 2 prongs. I did notice this difference in the pictures, but believed the description stating they would replace them. I hope this review saves someone the time lost on having to order then return this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tippecanoe

customer_reviews.title: Does not replace B&D batteries! Sellers are harassing me bc of this review!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Ever since I posted this review (below) the sellers have been emailing me at least once a day from different email addresses with some new sob story about how they’re struggling bc of my review and to please take it down. This is harassment that needs to stop. I’m not selling out my integrity for $30, so quit asking me to remove my fair and accurate review!!!! The product description is completely inaccurate; these do NOT replace black and decker HPB18-OPE! I wish I would have read the other reviews first. Look at the comparison picture and you can see the extra prong that prevents it from fitting in my weed whacker and hedge trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Looks fine, but would not fit my older B and ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks fine, but would not fit my older B and D tools. These have a 3rd lug where mine only has 2. Same battery number. Had to return them. Other than that they appear to be made well.
customer_reviews.author: sweetdreams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and  better then original
customer_reviews.text: Excellent replacement battery for the 18 volt B&D yard tools. These batteries have over double the amp hour capacity of the Black&Decker batteries, Topbatt @ 3600 mah vs B&D @ 1500 mah, this gives the tool a much longer work time and power, all at roughly half the cost! They charge on my original B&D charger and I am using them on the Blower, Hedge Trimmer, and String Trimmer. Note: B&D's Lithium Ion 20 volt batteries are not compatible with the 18 volt tool line so this is this is great way to upgrade your tools performance, Wish I had found these sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than original batteries??
customer_reviews.text: I have an 18-volt Black and Decker blower/sweeper. I bought it for the Little Woman because she liked blowing leaves but couldn't manage the Stihl leaf blower. The blower is terrific but after about five years the batteries discharge too quickly. These batteries hold a charge very well and have made the blowers motor perform as new. I would definitely buy these exact same batteries for the exact same seller again.
customer_reviews.author: BeemerPilot

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my B&D chain saw18vdc. The battery mAh are much larger than the OEM and lasted much longer in my yard trimming an Apple tree and some brush.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cioccio

customer_reviews.title: Works better than original equipment.
customer_reviews.text: The original battery that came with the Black and Decker 8 inch chain saw was smaller capacity and only one battery. These batteries came fully charge and seem to have more lasting power plus an extra battery to get the small jobs done. The slide in fit was a little tighter but that insures a good connection. There is an extra third connection pin/terminal that is not needed. I am not sure what it is for as the original battery only has 2 pins positive and negative terminal. Very happy with this order.
customer_reviews.author: David Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money here.
customer_reviews.text: Battery does not hold or maintain a charge. Originally charged overnight, about 12 hours. Used tool one time (brad nailer) shot one nail and battery was dead, bought a new charger, started again with overnight charge, one shot and battery was dead? Sixty odd dollars on batteries and a charger and nothing to show put an empty wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long
customer_reviews.text: I made sure I fully charged both batteries before I used them, Their power and duration was terrible. I do not recommend these batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Tom737

customer_reviews.title: Batteries  leak
customer_reviews.text: Thought they would work with my 3 B&D battery operated tools. The very first (initial) charge, both batteries leaked a clear fluid all over my counter and ruined my double B&D charger. Amazon is sending replacements but now I have nothing to charge them with. Frustrating!!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Nagel

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying anymore NmHi batteries, especially ones so cheap but the batteries fit my Firestorm drill and have had no issues clipping/unclipping from the drill. They have been charged on my Black and Decker Dual charger and the batteries perform better than the originals and stay charged just as long. I plan on buying a Lithium drill next but these batteries were a great deal and will let me use my favorite drill for a few more years.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wooten

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy go bad fast Read Update
customer_reviews.text: 4 out of 4 just quit working with in a month..... Update the people selling this junk are emailing me that they will pay me to remove this review. DO NOT BUY FROM THEM THEY ARE SHADY !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mojoman

customer_reviews.title: A year later, one dead, one won't keep a charge
customer_reviews.text: These started out great. They charged up nice and kept my once-a-week lawn work on track. But slowly they started losing charge. Now a year later one is completely dead and will not charge, and the other keeps enough charge to barely edge a small yard.
customer_reviews.author: C. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Right Price
customer_reviews.text: Batteries arrived with a partial charge. I put them on the charger to get charge up to full and it seemed like it took an extraordinary amount of time to completely charge (over 12 hours). Batteries work fine and seem to have plenty of oomph. Time will tell whether they last. Would recommend based on price and quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: frank e stone

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold a charge very long when not in use.
customer_reviews.text: These batteries are not very good. One battery was fully charged when I bought it. used on my hedge trimmer and got 5 minutes use with it. I am charging both batteries now and one is getting a bit warm, which means it is getting a charge. The other battery is room temperature and not charging. A waste of money in my opinion. The original batteries lasted much longer and the battery life was better.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Lesiuk

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these replacement batteries for my husband to use with his Black and Decker weed eater. He was lucky to get 10 minutes use out of the old ones with these he's getting 20 to 25 minutes use. It takes 6 hrs and 30 minutes to charge tho so plan ahead. My husband has been well pleased with these replacement batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Joyner

customer_reviews.title: Good Batteries, Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I received the two batteries which said they had extended power so I was excited that hopefully one battery would last to weedwack my small yard. However, that did not happen. I had to move onto the second battery. The seller was extremely nice when I voiced my concern. The seller immediately sent me two new batteries and I am optimistic that the new ones will work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H., Northampton PA

customer_reviews.title: Horrible batteries
customer_reviews.text: One year later, these batteries do not hold a charge and only last 5 minutes. Try another brand or go with OEM since they have a 2 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: DVDGRY

customer_reviews.title: Good value - perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Battery replaced my old B&D 18V batteries without a problem. Good value for my needs. Keeps my old B&D tools going for my small yard (about 3500 sq. feet) requirements. Use for hedge and grass trimmers. One charge allows me to complete entire job. 2 batteries included in order. Have only owned for a month, so no idea of how long the battery will last, so have only rated the longevity as average for the time being. Would recommend for any similar application.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne T. Cusick

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly - almost.
customer_reviews.text: These batteries charge quickly and hold power well. The only issue is that they don't fit without removing one plastic 'lug' which keeps them from sliding into the Black & Decker hedge clipper I have. I fixed it by cutting off the offending lug which is pretty simple since it's just plastic.
customer_reviews.author: marc g

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Batteries
customer_reviews.text: They are a very good replacement battery so far. Use on weed whip, leaf blower and Bush trimmer. Only have had for about two months so I cannot comment on longevity and battery life. It provides a lot of power for a significant amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Ginther

customer_reviews.title: Great batteries!
customer_reviews.text: These batteries work great. I really didn't want to replace my older B+D drill kit as it has always worked well for me but replacement batteries were always so expensive. These batteries are reasonably priced and function perfectly, allowing me to not dispose of my B+D drill kit (saving landfill).
customer_reviews.author: jimbo

customer_reviews.title: upgrading requires buying more items in order to work
customer_reviews.text: My old charger will not charge the new batteries. You should have told me I would have to buy another charger. I bought one from you, but in retrospect I would not have gone down this path, if I had known this. This is called false advertising
customer_reviews.author: walter pytlewski

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I have a number of B&D cordless tools. These batteries are cheaper that the brand replacements and has excellent running time. Will need to see if they last longer before needing to be replaced, which I think they will.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Check model # closely.
customer_reviews.text: Not a replacement for advertised batteries. Advertised has two terminals. These have three. Didn't notice that pictures showed three. I only need two.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good.
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly, have plenty of life, and hold a charge longer. As for "Longevity," the last generic B&D replacement batteries worked well, too, for a short period of time. I hope these will last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Crossword

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power- takes a little wiggling to fit.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this on my Black and decker weed eater. The battery supplies plenty of power for plenty of time. I can easily edge my yard and trees on one charge. I easily get 40 minutes of work out of these batteries without any noticeable decrease in power. That is the longest I have pushed them so I am sure they can go a lot longer! It does take a little wiggling to get the battery to seat in the weedeater properly. They plug into my old charger easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sara P

customer_reviews.title: works on my 2 pin equipment
customer_reviews.text: there is a gap for the 3rd pin so it makes no difference. a little tight fitting but it was like that when I got it in the first place. a couple of charges later slides in better.
customer_reviews.author: 4birds

customer_reviews.title: They worked
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was quick. Despite the fact that batteries were three lug and my tools are 2 lug batteries fit and worked well. Came already charged and ready to go. Have not used much yet so cannot speak to longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Cardending

customer_reviews.title: Great capacity
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact I can charge them, let them sit for a week, then put them on my cordless weed eater and still trim my entire yard on just one battery. Better than double the capacity of the original. My cordless drill can go most of the day on just one battery. But it doesn't fit all of my devices. Cordless drill ok. Weed eater - no go
customer_reviews.author: AlanK

customer_reviews.title: Better than originals.
customer_reviews.text: These have lots of life. I'm using them to cut weeds and grass along the river. These batteries provide more power for cutting. They last as long as the original battery, about 15 minutes usage for heavy cutting. I'm extremely happy with their performance.
customer_reviews.author: Ducky

customer_reviews.title: Third prong is a problem for some B&D tools
customer_reviews.text: The batteries charged fine in my high-speed charger in about 90 minutes each. These batteries have three prongs instead of two. I have several B&D lawn tools that use 18V batteries and about half of them could not accept the third prong. In those it fit, the power seems the same as the original B&D batteries, but I will not know how long they run until springtime.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great batteries for the money =)
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these batteries as replaclements for the original batteries for my weed whacker and leaf blower. They're GREAT! They definitely hold a charge, and I'm able to finish the yard with power to spare. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Polish

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: These seem to perform just as good as the B+D OEM originals. You never really know until the next season, in terms of yard equipment, and the tools may not get used enough to judge the battery life and recharge rates. The price made it worthwhile to keep our 18 volt equipment going.
customer_reviews.author: Vicfixit

customer_reviews.title: Great batteries
customer_reviews.text: I have a drill that acts as a drill and a screwdriver and I can't find one like it so the replacement batteries save me time and the possibility of using two separate tools.
customer_reviews.author: bobg

customer_reviews.title: Great batteries at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Only time will tell but after a few months and several uses these are still doing better then the original batteries ever did.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good
customer_reviews.text: I have just received these batteries and have charged them. They were delivered promptly. However, as to Longevity and Battery life, it is much too soon to know. If they perform as indicated, they are a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: ALM or LFM

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know if the problem was the battery or my drill???
customer_reviews.text: I bought new batteries because my B&D Firestorm didn’t have the power for my job. New batteries made no difference—- I borrowed a friends B&D drill with same size battery but was much more powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Sue

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These batteries work great on my black and decker trimmer. They hold the charge well and feel to be the same weight as the original ones that came with the trimmer. There are two included in the shipment
customer_reviews.author: Jill S

customer_reviews.title: Great battery
customer_reviews.text: So far these batteries are working great. I would give a 5 star review but I can't comment on how long the batteris would run on a charge since I only run my blower for short periods.
customer_reviews.author: Britt L. Watts

customer_reviews.title: yes they came
customer_reviews.text: from 1:00Pm-4:00Pm today [Upgraded to 3600mAh] HPB18 Battery for Black and Decker 18V Battery 3.6Ah HPB18-OPE 244760-00 A1718 FSB18 Fire
customer_reviews.author: Dell Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Black & Decker replacement 18 volt batteries
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with purchase. The timely shipping, price, quality of product, and it's performance so far. I waited until I had an opportunity to use the batteries a few times in my tools before writing review. All seems as good as or better than original Black and Decker parts. The one unknown factor now is how long they will last. Will have to wait a while for that but so far, very pleased with product ( batteries and charger ) . NC Larry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Got these in one day and work really well, and I recommend buying rather paying big $$$ for Brand name ones.
customer_reviews.author: GOOZIEMOM

customer_reviews.title: Better Than The Original Batteries
customer_reviews.text: Takes about the same time to charge, but......Lasts much longer, and holds a charge much longer. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McMannon

customer_reviews.title: These do not fit in Black and Decker tools.
customer_reviews.text: They are very tempting but they don't work in Black and Decker tools. I ended up buying B&D original batteries. I was recently contacted by the company asking that I change my review. I have no idea about the quality of the batteries but they were advertised as fitting Black and Decker and they did not.
customer_reviews.author: Art Way

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Put new life back into my old black and decker drills. Have used my drills sparingly so far but charge has been good.
customer_reviews.author: N. Goggans

customer_reviews.title: Great price in better than the originals
customer_reviews.text: These batteries are a hundred times better than the originals that came with the unit and the price was very good
customer_reviews.author: Roger A.

customer_reviews.title: Quick service, good value, needed new batteries for my drill
customer_reviews.text: Quick service, good value, needed new batteries for my drill - didn't want to have to buy all new drill and attachments, but the batteries were wearing out - thanks for the new batteries!
customer_reviews.author: S. Waller

customer_reviews.title: do not hold a charge very long
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my string trimmer and get 5-10 minutes of trim time per battery. I am constantly charging them.
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: the opposite of extended capacity.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these. They did not last anywhere near as long as the originals they replaced. In this case the generic was NOT as good as the much more expensive original.
customer_reviews.author: Magmore

customer_reviews.title: Great 18v rechargeable batteries for Black and Decker tools
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a Black and Decker sawsall that I found at a Goodwill that had never been used. The batteries are of great quality and long lasting!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Wilt

customer_reviews.title: The two batteries for one low price is a good deal. I now have a backup when one ...
customer_reviews.text: These batteries fit my Black and Decker hedge clipper and string trimmer. They were almost fully charged when I received them. The two batteries for one low price is a good deal. I now have a backup when one battery depletes.
customer_reviews.author: Ron K

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: These replacement batteries are great and two for the price of a regular battery! I think they work better than the original ever did! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: T!953

customer_reviews.title: Finally
customer_reviews.text: Thought that I would have to throw out the B&D cordless drill and got lucky and for this.
customer_reviews.author: busyman

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Work great and last longer than the original battery that came with weed-whacker.
customer_reviews.author: No Public Name

customer_reviews.title: Excellent battery life
customer_reviews.text: Love the new batteries. You have to work with them to get them to fit right though.
customer_reviews.author: Delores A. Maynard

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement Battery
customer_reviews.text: The battery is a direct replacement for the battery that came with the blower. The battery works great - plenty of power, as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: RLG

customer_reviews.title: Good Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: I don’t yet know the longevity of these, but compared to my original batteries which finally died, these hold a charge much longer, though one is still not enough to complete edging/trimming in my mid-size yard.
customer_reviews.author: FunnyFam

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the batteries that came with my drill. This battery last 3 times as long as the original battery.
customer_reviews.author: Karen C Francis

customer_reviews.title: Work just like original batteries
customer_reviews.text: Work just as well as the original battery that came with the heade trimmer. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Riz

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected in my weed eater
customer_reviews.text: Item is as described and worked in m weed eater fine. Yet, only used one time so far
customer_reviews.author: Allen E Glover

customer_reviews.title: Batteries fit my B&D tools and came fully charged, ready to go!
customer_reviews.text: These new batteries are exactly what my Black and Decker tools needed. I liked that they came fully charged and they came in ONE day! Nice job! I hope I get a good 2-3 years out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: durability
customer_reviews.text: These are stronger and last longer than the cheap ones supplied with the tools I bought. Highly recommend them because of the 3600mAh rating.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Pursley

customer_reviews.title: Got a good deal on these by adding to my Amazon account
customer_reviews.text: So far these batteries do not show when they are fully charged like the original does. The original battery charger turns off after the original is fully charged - about 4 or 5 hours. The new battery is still charging after 6 or 7 hours, but it has a lot of power like it is all charged.
customer_reviews.author: Ron H.

customer_reviews.title: mislead
customer_reviews.text: was lead to believe they would fit a force trimmer but do not.probably a good battery but useless to me
customer_reviews.author: john sekula

customer_reviews.title: Don't fit!
customer_reviews.text: They don't fit my black and decker, weed W., Pole trimmer, or hedge trimmer! No star rating!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Johansson

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: My original batteries were tired; with these new batteries, my devices function as they did when new. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C & S Newman

customer_reviews.title: Good OEM replacement, but not as good as Lithium-ion option
customer_reviews.text: They function fairly well compared to OEM batteries, but they are Ni-cad and don’t hold a charge very long. A better option would be to spend a few dollars more for the Lithium-ion version.
customer_reviews.author: osugrad85

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value... works as good or better than the OEM packs did when new.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: battery use
customer_reviews.text: I bought these batteries to replace the original ones for my Black and Decker weed wacker. The price was good, only $32 for both, but the life of the charged battery is not good. After initially charging them they only lasted about 15 minutes each. Not long enough for my property. Several charges later they still only last about 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Judith B Fay

customer_reviews.title: Casing may fail during normal use
customer_reviews.text: The battery seems to perform well but I had a structural failure of the casing the first time I used it under normal home use of my drill changing a few decking boards
customer_reviews.author: Austin Grant

customer_reviews.title: Stronger that the originals
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for over a year and are still going strong ... going to buy two more
customer_reviews.author: Lockridge

customer_reviews.title: Ok batteries
customer_reviews.text: Lower rating since capacity is not as good as original batteries, don't hold a charge as long.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda J. Fortin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Batteries connected to B&D chargers and snapped into the B&D leaf blowers just like the originals. Can now use the leaf blower until the task is done without replacing the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Replacement batteries for Black & Decker
customer_reviews.text: Just started using these new replacement batteries and they are powerfully great! Hoping they recharge and stay like new for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Carter

customer_reviews.title: Better than original
customer_reviews.text: These batteries were the right price and run longer than the OEM batteries. No idea so far on long term life, but very good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Don Churchwell

customer_reviews.title: Good value, no problems.
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be just fine. No one knows how long they'll last, but battery technology (even older) has improved since my OEM batteries were made.
customer_reviews.author: 80's Kid

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Batteries arrived charged, worked well. Did full charge on them to be sure per instructions, they work with more power and longer run time than factory 1.5ah units
customer_reviews.author: J's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced old batteries that came with B&D weed eater and blower bought in 2011 on Amazon. Hot rodded those old B&D's!!!!
customer_reviews.author: billknud

customer_reviews.title: Should get with fast charger
customer_reviews.text: With the fast charger, batteries charge within an hour, use mostly for B&D weed trimmer
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Littler

customer_reviews.title: Fits well.  What order again.
customer_reviews.text: Got what was described to me. Fitwell works well. Fast shipping what are they again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: These are great replacement batteries for my Black & Decker Cordless Drill
customer_reviews.text: These are great replacement batteries for my Black & Decker Cordless Drill. They arrived with a very good charge still in them, enough to do a days worth of indoor projects! They fit perfectly! These batteries have a higher charge capacity than the original battery, so I'm hoping I can get a longer run-time than the old battery.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: They do fit, just try harder and wiggle em
customer_reviews.text: There a tight fit have to kinda wiggle and force em on my wacker but they work great
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey b.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Battery
customer_reviews.text: Items arrived on time and halfway charged. i was able to trim the edges of my entire front yard (town home) right out the box. They really hold a great charge, a lot better than the originals that came with my trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: AJ8

customer_reviews.title: Not B&D, but works fine
customer_reviews.text: This is not an OEM battery, but it works fine for me. The attachment slides are a bit stiff and I have to jam the battery on to the tool, but once in place the power is adequate and lasts about as long, but not as long, as the original battery.
customer_reviews.author: B-1 Bombshell

customer_reviews.title: very good batteries
customer_reviews.text: better than my older batteries very impressed with how long they last
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Thompson

customer_reviews.title: perfect mechanical fit with B&D products -weed eater, Jaws type chain saw and pole saw
customer_reviews.text: works very well as far as power and charge duration in use- classic NIMH battery behavior as expected- check your B&D charger to see the very small printing for "use on NI-MH/ Ni-CD battery" printed on the plug/power supply. We are very pleased with the price and delivery- about a week-and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work but made of cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: They work but the construction is of cheap plastic. They do not fit very well into the equipment or the battery charger.
customer_reviews.author: Bryon Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be working well. These are metal hydride and should be better than NiCad
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two. One came completely discharged. I charged both batteries and they worked well on my Black & Decker leaf blower.
customer_reviews.author: Technically Proficient

customer_reviews.title: Fast and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price and the batteries were received 1 week earlier than initially promised.
customer_reviews.author: G. Svanas

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Batteries last just as long as OEM
customer_reviews.author: Rick Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Bad replacement batty
customer_reviews.text: These battery’s are not compatible with the black an decker tool I have bad advertising. Miss leading, I have two pin and these have three pin power plugs. Do not buy if you need a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD REPLACEMENT
customer_reviews.text: INITIAL USE INDICATES THESE ARE AS GOOD AS THE ORIGINALS - HOPEFULLY LONG LASTING.
customer_reviews.author: amazonreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great battery, better then the original
customer_reviews.text: Received my battery's and checked them out. So far very pleased and the battery performance is great
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Better than original
customer_reviews.text: These cranks out some power. The old B&D tools have new life!
customer_reviews.author: Panamint

customer_reviews.title: Fitment
customer_reviews.text: Not bad just do not fit very well and difficult to install. Must be a half a millemeter off in copying DeWalt
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Well made
customer_reviews.text: My old Ni-cds were totally fried. The NiMH cells are fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: jimmyjoe

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great service, easy to deal with.
customer_reviews.text: Batteries worked great Nd at a price that made keeping my drill alive worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve the Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great
customer_reviews.text: Best price found and they are made for the particular 18V drill we have.
customer_reviews.author: M Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: The two batteries arrived on time and seem to work. I cannot comment on longetivity yet.
customer_reviews.author: B. K. Wallen

Professional replacement for black and decker 18v battery HPB18 HPB18-OPE HPB18-OPE2 244760-00 A1718 A18 A18E Firestorm FS180BX FS18BX FS18FL FSB18 FS18C

Compatible with black and decker 18v cordless power tools BD18PSK, BDGL1800, BPT318, BPT318-XE, CCS818, CCS818-2, CD182K-2, CD18SFRK, CD18SK-2, CDC180AK, CDC180ASB, CDC18GK2, DGL18K-2, EPC18, EPC182K2, EPC186, EPC186BK, EPC188, EPC188BK, EPC188CBK, EPC188XE, etc

The battery offers a longer lifespan and retains its charge 2x longer than similar 18-volt NiCad batteries, holds a charge for up to 500 days, fade-free power,make your process completed perfectly,self-discharge is lower, holds a longer charge than other batteries
